Job Title: AI Value Enablement & Governance Manager - ASX200 Business
Ad Text:
Kick off 2026 with this amazing opportunity in AI working with a reputable strong performing ASX200 business 
  
As an AI Value Enablement & Governance Manager you are accountable for empowering teams to deliver measurable business value through responsible AI enablement, deployment oversight, and governance. 
  
You will be responsible for the following: 


Copilot Studio Agent Enablement​
Providing day-to-day guidance and hands-on support for AI enthusiasts, focusing on building and refining agents using Copilot Studio.​
Running workshops and enablement sessions to upskill internal teams on Copilot Studio capabilities and responsible AI practices.​
AI Deployment Oversight & Usage Monitoring​
Monitoring and governing AI deployments via the Copilot Studio Admin UI, collaborating closely with IT teams.​
Building dashboards and reporting tools to monitor AI usage, adoption, and performance metrics across deployed solutions—including enterprise AI solutions on Databricks.​ 
AI Risk & Standards Governance​
Building and maintaining automated mechanisms (e.g., Databricks evaluation logs) to monitor risks in production AI solutions.​
Leading efforts to meet obligations under Smart’s AI Policies for use cases, including process alignment and documentation.

Experience required: 
At least one (1) year of hands-on experience building agents using Copilot Studio or similar platforms.​
Demonstrated experience supporting AI deployments and monitoring usage/adoption.​
Experience building dashboards and reporting including for enterprise AI solutions on Databricks.​
Experience implementing risk monitoring for AI solutions.​
Familiarity with AI standards, compliance frameworks, and process documentations
Skills required: 
Strong analytical background, with experience building dashboards and basic coding knowledge.​
Deep understanding of Copilot Studio, Copilot Studio Admin UI, and AI agent frameworks.​
Ability to run workshops, and training sessions.​
Familiarity with AI governance, risk monitoring, and compliance standards.​
Effective collaboration with IT, risk , and business teams.
Strong numerically and analytically. 
Data-driven oversight and accountability for outcomes.
Continuous improvement and strategic adaptation.
Exceptional stakeholder engagement and customer-centric enablement
Preferred qualifications:
Bachelor’s Degree in engineering or a similar field 
Certifications in Microsoft Copilot Studio,Azure, AI governance
Apply today for a confidential discussion. Our client I looking to review CVs before the Christmas break
